description: Uses an additional container component if `ListItemSecondaryAction` is the last child.

autoFocus.description:
If `true`, the list item will be focused during the first mount.
Focus will also be triggered if the value changes from false to true.

button.description:
If `true`, the list item will be a button (using `ButtonBase`). Props intended
for `ButtonBase` can then be applied to `ListItem`.

type.name: custom

children.description:
The content of the component. If a `ListItemSecondaryAction` is used it must
be the last child.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.

ContainerComponent.description: The container component used when a `ListItemSecondaryAction` is the last child.

ContainerProps.description: Props applied to the container component if used.

dense.description: If `true`, compact vertical padding designed for keyboard and mouse input will be used.

disabled.description: If `true`, the list item will be disabled.

disableGutters.description: If `true`, the left and right padding is removed.

divider.description: If `true`, a 1px light border is added to the bottom of the list item.

name: ListItem

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the (normally root) `component` element. May be wrapped by a `container`.
descriptions.container: Styles applied to the `container` element if `children` includes `ListItemSecondaryAction`.
descriptions.focusVisible: Pseudo-class applied to the `component`'s `focusVisibleClassName` prop if `button={true}`.
descriptions.dense: Styles applied to the `component` element if dense.
descriptions.alignItemsFlexStart: Styles applied to the `component` element if `alignItems="flex-start"`.
descriptions.disabled: Pseudo-class applied to the inner `component` element if `disabled={true}`.
descriptions.divider: Styles applied to the inner `component` element if `divider={true}`.
descriptions.gutters: Styles applied to the inner `component` element if `disableGutters={false}`.
descriptions.button: Styles applied to the inner `component` element if `button={true}`.
descriptions.secondaryAction: Styles applied to the `component` element if `children` includes `ListItemSecondaryAction`.
descriptions.selected: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `selected={true}`.
